title: The Widow of Protected Occupier / Widow who is Protected Occupier, and the family / families having Blind and Physically Handicapped members, shall be given a preference to select tenement of their choice as far as possible
clause_text: The Widow of Protected Occupier / Widow who is Protected Occupier, and the family / families having Blind and Physically Handicapped members, shall be given a preference to select tenement of their choice as far as possible. However in case where same tenement is preferred by more than one such eligible dweller, the decision shall be taken by drawing of lots among themselves.
section: ALLOTMENT OF THE TENEMENTS TO THE PROTECTED OCCUPIERS

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
